    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Commeration of Ilan Rimon -an Israel Hero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Commeration von Ilan Rimon - ein Israel Held</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commeration d'Ilan Rimon - un héros de l'Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Commeration de Ilan Rimon - um herói de Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commeration di Ilan Rimon - un hero dell'Israele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Commeration Ilan Rimon - ένας ήρωας του 
Ισραήλ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Commeration de Ilan Rimon - héroe de Israel</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a Learning Unit including informative text and word glossary , on Ilan Ramon's life, work sheets for reading comprehension and an Assessment Rubric for teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Asronaut</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Columbia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tragedy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ilan Ramon.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine erlernenmaßeinheit 
einschließlich informativen Text und Wortglossar, auf Ilan Ramons dem
Leben, den Arbeit Blättern für Leseerfassen und einer Einschätzung 
Rubrik für Lehrer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une unité d'étude comprenant le texte et 
le glossaire instructifs de mot, sur la vie d'Ilan Ramon, des feuilles
de travail pour la compréhension de lecture et une rubrique 
d'évaluation pour des professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma unidade de aprendizagem including o 
texto e o glossário informative da palavra, na vida de Ilan Ramon, 
nas folhas do trabalho para a compreensão da leitura e em um rubric 
da avaliação para professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'unità imparante compreso testo ed il 
glossario informativi di parola, su vita di Ilan Ramon, sui fogli del 
lavoro per la comprensione della lettura e su una rubrica di 
valutazione per gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια μονάδα εκμάθησης συμπεριλαμβανομένου 
του πληροφοριακού γλωσσαριού κειμένων και λέξης, στη ζωή Ilan 
Ramon, τα φύλλα εργασίας για την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης και μια 
ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης για τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una unidad que aprende incluyendo el texto
y el glosario informativos de la palabra, en la vida de Ilan Ramon, 
hojas del trabajo para la comprensión de la lectura y una rúbrica 
del gravamen para los profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Held</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Asronaut</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
